channel.title: I really doubt you can help me with this
channel.description: ok i really doubt anyone can help me with this, but i've made some custom quests... can anyone provide me with the coding and tell me where to put it... so that when you start the custom quest i made... the name of the quest turns yellow... so you know it's been started... and once it's finished it turns green... like runescape.

item.title: I really doubt you can help me with this
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Basic thing is this:

In your class that handles text, there should be sendquest methods, like

sendquest(TEXT HERE, ID);

if (questIsComplete)
sendquest("@gre@A Quest", #);
if (questIsInProgress)
sendquest("@yel@A Quest", #);
if (questHasNotStartedYet)
sendquest("@red@A Quest", #);

That’s the basic idea.

Read full topic
item.source: I really doubt you can help me with this
